landing.vision_heading: New Metal – Your Partner in Construction and Innovation
landing.vision_description: At New Metal, we’re more than a metal construction company – we’re a vision of excellence and a commitment to redefining quality standards. Since our founding, we’ve been delivering innovative solutions that combine engineering precision with sustainability, leaving a lasting mark on every project we undertake.
landing.materials_description: We use premium materials to ensure exceptional performance and long-lasting results.

about.heading: About Us
about.description: New Metal is a leading company in the field of metal constructions and integrated contracting. Since its establishment, the company has been committed to delivering high-quality projects that adhere to the highest engineering standards. With a focus on meeting client aspirations, New Metal continuously strives to foster innovation and achieve excellence.

analyze.heading: Latest Analytics
analyze.description: A quick overview of your recent performance, including clients, projects, and locations.

whyus.heading: Why Us?
whyus.description: Our mission is to improve lives by constructing the buildings and infrastructure communities rely on, ensuring a better and more sustainable future for everyone.

footer.description: We welcome queries from all our stakeholders and would like to hear from you

about_page.company_description: New Metal is a leader in the field of metal construction and integrated contracting. Since its establishment, it has been committed to delivering high-quality projects according to the highest engineering standards to meet client aspirations and enhance innovation and excellence.
about_page.mission_description: We aim to achieve leadership in the field of metal construction by providing innovative services based on high quality, commitment to deadlines, and complete customer satisfaction.
about_page.vision_description: To become the first choice for customers in the field of metal construction and contracting by enhancing innovation, adhering to global standards, and focusing on environmental and social sustainability.

services.heading: Our Services
services.description: We offer a wide range of specialized design and construction services, utilizing the latest technologies to meet our clients' needs with the highest quality.

list.heading: Construction of Fixed and Mobile Office Spaces
list.description: We provide design and construction services for fully equipped office spaces, both fixed and mobile.

list.heading: Construction of Agricultural Greenhouses
list.description: Design and construction of agricultural greenhouses with complete equipment to ensure the best results.

list.heading: Integrated Works
list.description: We offer comprehensive solutions that cover all client needs in construction and design.

list.heading: Supply and Installation of Metal Structures and Warehouses
list.description: Supply and installation of all types of metal structures, canopies, trusses, and warehouses.

list.heading: Canopy and Truss Coverings
list.description: Supply and installation of all types of coverings needed for canopies, trusses, and warehouses.

list.heading: Raising and Constructing Light Floors
list.description: We implement projects for raising and constructing pre-fabricated light floors according to the highest standards.
